xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors
Class DistanceQuery

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.cursors.SecureDecoratorCursor<E>
      xxl.core.cursors.filters.WhileTaker<DistanceWeightedKPE>
          xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors.DistanceQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Iterator<DistanceWeightedKPE>, Cursor<DistanceWeightedKPE>
public class DistanceQuery
extends WhileTaker<DistanceWeightedKPE>

A DistanceQuery delivers all neighbors of a query-object whose distance to the query- object is below epsilon.

See Also:
NearestNeighborQuery

Constructor Detail

DistanceQuery

public DistanceQuery(NearestNeighborQuery nnQuery,
                     double epsilon)
Initializes the DistanceQuery.

Parameters:
nnQuery - the query-operator which returns its results sorted by the minimum distance to the query object
epsilon - the maximum distance between the query object and qualifying result- objects
